text: @Mike_Pence @realDonaldTrump About time after the left-winged demon Democrats decided they would send Covid-19/Coronavirus patients into the nursing homes and they died along with many more of our senior citizens and I am a senior citizen. Pathetic leadership by Democratic leaders......
